title: Solar keeps the lights on for rural Kenyans during pandemic blackouts
description: "Sometimes I would even take the tin lamp to use in the kitchen, leaving my children in darkness. But now I do not have to because there is solar lighting in my kitchen."
cleaned_text: the lights on for rural Kenyans during pandemic blackouts Supply chain disruption from COVID-19 combined with extreme weather has disrupted electricity supplies.
